website_summaries.verdict: An attractive leather bag with space for all the essentials and more. Multiple color options.
pros: Bag is made of real leather that's as sturdy as it is beautiful
Lined, and has a zipper to keep things inside
There are a few pockets on the inside and outside to store and organize items
Strap is made of fabric and is adjustable
cons: Leather is easily nicked and scratched, and zippers sometimes get stuck

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Sak Crossbody bag. Just as expected - can't  go wrong.
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing bag. I had purchased one in black previously of the same style and came to love it, so this is a perfect addition to my wardrobe. Very well made and just right for what I need. The only thing that could be better, is if the strap did not start to show wear in the form of "pilling". It is what I believe is partly a cotton weave and maybe something else, but is durable and fashionable. I LOVE the red color and it is true to the picture. I will be looking for other colors in this same bag.
customer_reviews.author: mompeaches

customer_reviews.title: iboth my sister and i love this purse i got her a black one and ...
customer_reviews.text: iboth my sister and i love this purse i got her a black one and recently got her the black sak wallet i got the ruby one and wallet also dont buy any other handbag id give a ten star review
customer_reviews.author: nora mudd

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Work and holds both my Laptop and Tablet.
customer_reviews.text: I love my new bag! It fits my tablet and my MacBook so that I don't have to carry two bags as a purse and for my computers. I'm using it for work right now and will definitely use it for travel as well. I'm waiting to see if it will hold up after a year worth of hauling and constant travel. Here's hoping! One down side, I miss-measured the MacBook so it doesn't zip when that is in the inner pocket, but I'm ok with that.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca K

customer_reviews.title: Love this stylish bag
customer_reviews.text: This SAK Iris bag is just what I was looking for. Very roomy without being too bulky. A perfect fit across the body. Lots of space for large wallet, 2 glass cases, 2 big inside pockets, and 2 outside pockets, one of which is zippered. I bought the mint color, and it is a very nice neutral color, perfect for south Florida year round. My bag arrived quickly and in perfect condition. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Pink Oleander

customer_reviews.title: Great, but different lining!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -- super soft fabric shoulder strap doesn't get crackly like leather -- perfect size for what I wanted, big enough to hold my iPad in chunky case, iPhone in case, big wallet, and a few small essential purse things, but not so big it sticks way out and looks funny as a shoulder bag -- can carry as shoulder bag, or for better ergonomics/posture, cross body style -- great price as compared to what else is out there Cons -- the lining that came in mine is nothing like what's pictured here (here is tan, mine is colorful patterned) prob wouldn't have got if saw that first, but note turning bc other features far outweigh the misrepresentation
customer_reviews.author: MamaDog

customer_reviews.title: beautiful handbags. I will keep ordering them as styles ...
customer_reviews.text: I was turned on to 'The Sak' a few years ago. I absolutely endorse these well made, beautiful handbags. I will keep ordering them as styles change and I tire of the ones I currently have.
customer_reviews.author: Baba

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a picky sister
customer_reviews.text: Made fun of my sister for wanting this purse. She actually put it in my Amazon cart herself, instructing me to get it for her for Christmas. Got it for her (cause I'm basically afraid of her) and the purse is adorable! Super soft with great pockets. It's a little brighter pink than I thought it would be but its beautiful and practical and I would have never given it to her if she didn't scare me. Going to order one for myself! Ha!
customer_reviews.author: kasey kruft

customer_reviews.title: Hated to return this bag
customer_reviews.text: Hated to return this bag, it was lovely and perfect in every way but the color was just not right for me, a very bright pink but just did not go with most of my outfits, Shipping was very prompt and I had some reservations about returning it as it was honestly a beautiful and well made Sak!!
customer_reviews.author: J.Anderson

customer_reviews.title: One drawback
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Leather is super soft, bag is a good size. I purchased the 'stone' color and have found that the back of the bag is turning blue from rubbing against my jeans as I walk. This hasn't happened to any of my other bags or clothing. I tried to wipe it with a damp cloth and had success removing the coloring from the leather, but the stitching seems to be stained. A bummer because I really like this bag.
customer_reviews.author: SoccaDiva617

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bag. I knew what I was getting because I already have it in a darker brown color. It has lots of compartments and is the perfect size. You can't beat what you get with this purse. It is perfect for basically any activity. You can dress it up or down. I really like the tobacco color because it will go with so many of my favorite summer sandals/shoes.
customer_reviews.author: dm5_osu

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I like this bag a great deal. I wanted a crossbody bag with outside pockets that was somewhat unique - I don't like having the same thing as everyone else. This bag fit the bill as the color is uncommon. The one thing I don't like is the main zipper. I prefer nylon zippers to metal ones as the metal ones are rough and tend to scratch me and/or chip my nails. If this bag had a nylon zipper, I would have given it 5 starts instead of 4.
customer_reviews.author: KMJ

customer_reviews.title: Stylish Sak
customer_reviews.text: This is the crossbody purse I have been searching for. The dark indigo color is perfect, the size is great for my needs (including my Ipad), and it has internal/external pockets for all my needs. I will watch to see if the lining holds up (a warning from other reviewers), but for now I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Pincher

customer_reviews.title: Great Crossbody
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. I love a crossbody but my last thirtyone crossbody was almost identical but a bit smaller. With this bag everything fits nicely and I have plenty of room for more things. It keeps my things very organized and I love the leather. It's easy to keep clean and looks great. I've already had compliments and this color is vibrant.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: i would swear by this purse
customer_reviews.text: This it the best purse I have ever had. I used to buy the cross body bags that look like hobo/hippie bag and every single one of them fell apart on me so I was expecting the same for this bag too however when it came in the mail I could tell it was a great quality leather and was made to last I have now had the same purse for over 2 years and it is still in great shape
customer_reviews.author: Maggie wise

customer_reviews.title: definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I've carried this purse all spring and summer. I love it! It has held up great and is very stylish. It's easy to wipe off for cleaning (germaphobe here). The pop of color is just what I wanted along with a comfortable, mid sized cross body (as opposed to the teeny clutch style cross body minis) The pocket options and lining are great, too. I can't wait to get one in fall colors!
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen409

customer_reviews.title: Nice, fun bag
customer_reviews.text: Fun looking bag. Roomy, great front and back pockets, room for my Kindle, wallet, phone, and other miscellaneous items. The material feels a little thin, but still seems sturdy. So far no pulls or tears, and I'm fairly hard on my handbags. It's a fun bag to take for day trips shopping, sightseeing, etc. Wears comfortably through out the day, easy to access, nice casual, fun feel to the bag. Looks better in person.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can fit a full sheet of paper in this purse if I need to and yet it isn't so cavernous that I search 5 minutes to find my pen at the bottom. The strap is a great length and I love that it is adjustable. I also like that the top can be completely secured with the zipper. It has just the right number of pockets for my needs: two exterior (one zips closed), 3 interior (two half the width and one full width).
customer_reviews.author: Tamra Karl

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not a cross-body
customer_reviews.text: I just received this bag. It is cute but the strap is much too short to use it as a cross-body bag. I'm only 5 feet tall and am pretty small but when I put it on across my body the bag came right under my arm and I had adjusted the strap all the way to the end. I'll make it work but if you are a taller person (anything over 5 feet) know that it really isn't a cross-body purse - more of a shoulder bag.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cross body purse
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought this and is extremely pleased. Good quality leather and zippers work well. Roomy. Can carry everything that is necessary plus more. Roomy enough for cell phone, iPad and lots of incidentals. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Harrell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wife love the size and color. She is a fan of this brand. Update... She still loves it, but each corner is breaking down and wearing out after just a few months. Should have stayed looking newer longer.
customer_reviews.author: Derick D. Cummins

customer_reviews.title: Chic and practical
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size for me- a mom who likes to be chic but still needs to carry a diaper and a snack. The outer pockets in front and back are perfect for quick access items like keys or cell phone. Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Deployed Gal

customer_reviews.title: Love this purse
customer_reviews.text: I have used this style for 2 years. It has plenty of pockets some with zippers to keep things organized. It is deep enough to hold a lot but not so deep that you can't find anything.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte McKinnon

customer_reviews.title: Good purse for the money
customer_reviews.text: Love this cross-body bag. I have other SAK cross-body bags. They are all wonderful. These are purses you can keep for years. I usually switch out handbags on a regular basis and I reach for these SAK bags. They have plenty of space. The leather is supple and they're well made.
customer_reviews.author: PBB

customer_reviews.title: after a few months my bag is falling apart
customer_reviews.text: I'm s big fan of this brands products. I have a similar bag that i bought 3 yrs ago and its still in good shape. I wanted a new color so I got this one. For some reason one of the front pockets is separating therefore stuff is falling underneath the lining of my bag. I'm so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: ReneeElaine

customer_reviews.title: Really nice handbag!
customer_reviews.text: My wife loved this handbag. I bought it for her as a present.
customer_reviews.author: DaveWK

customer_reviews.title: I love this purse
customer_reviews.text: I love this purse...I was able to put everything I needed in this bag for a quick weekend trip. I was a bit hesitant to purchase due to a couple of reviews that were previously written, but I am so glad that I looked over those reviews and chose to make this purchase. The leather is very soft! The top zipper was a little "sticky" for the first few times I used it, but loosened up quickly. I would definitely recommend this bag!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Andrews

customer_reviews.title: NOT AVAILABLE in this style!
customer_reviews.text: This LOOKS like a great purse and The SAK makes nice leather accessories for a reasonable price, however, the purse pictured here doesn't seem to be available. I was sent one that had a looping stud design (including a turquoise accent stud!) that is nothing at all like this one. IF this one can be found...I'll reorder!!!
customer_reviews.author: Designer MomTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Showing Wear After Ten Days Use
customer_reviews.text: After using this bag for ten days I've noticed the leather is worn on the corners. Also a few of the studs are popping out; they are no longer lying flat against the bag and the prongs are showing. This is certainly unacceptable after so short a time. I'm surprised by this as SAK bags are usually higher quality than this bag appears to be. I'm returning it.
customer_reviews.author: happyheathen

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS BAG
customer_reviews.text: My second Sak, and I like it even more than the first, as this is slightly larger and roomier. The color is vibrant, and the leather soft, not cheap looking. i have had a lot of problems in the past with bags slipping off my shoulder, but not The Sak. I would highly recommend this bag.
customer_reviews.author: MICHELE'S MOM

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the Iris bag
customer_reviews.text: Leather is very soft. Bag is wide enough for a large wallet and deep enough to hold lots of things! Convenient outside pockets on both sides and 3 inside sections. Long strap is adjustable and has a shoulder pad for extra comfort. Cayenne color is very fresh looking (a little deeper color than pictured) and printed lining is fun.
customer_reviews.author: CindyR

customer_reviews.title: She seems quite satisfied with it
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my daughter. She seems quite satisfied with it. Good size.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Lacher

customer_reviews.title: Great and pretty Sak crossbody bag
customer_reviews.text: Wow the color is very pretty. I like it very much the adjustment of strap is easy to do when you need it longer or shorter. Thanks for making a great product. This is my 3rd Sak purchase. Thanks Dawn
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great purse, odd color.
customer_reviews.text: I like the bag, but the color was odd. It's lavender, stone and putty all put together. Had to return it was going to be difficult to match. Beautiful bag though!.
customer_reviews.author: GV

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very stylish and well made. I wear this with everything.
customer_reviews.author: Papaya7

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the SAK!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this on my wishlist for a while and jumped on it when I got the email it was marked down (thank you Amazon!). Quality is great and I'm extremely happy with it. Definitely will shop Amazon again!
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed to find that the strap is made from material ...
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed to find that the strap is made from material instead of leather to match the purse. The zipper on the top of the purse is ugly and cheapens the quality. I have returned this item to the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia J. Bahr

customer_reviews.title: Mislead
customer_reviews.text: So I love my new bag but am disappointed in the description as it shows a solid strap which would be perfect- instead I received a guitar strap looking one- :(
customer_reviews.author: Karen W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Purse
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this purse. It is a very soft and rich chocolate color. It is deep and holds an amazing amount of stuff. It was the first Sak brand I had purchased and I would buy another style in that brand. It was a good price on Amazon as compared with department stores I had looked at it in.
customer_reviews.author: kglend

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag for my Mom for Christmas and I know she is going to love it. She's always been a fan of Sak bags and this one will be no exception. The strap is perfect because she can adjust it to her liking and it seems like it will last a while. Looks roomy enough inside to hold quite a bit without breaking. Good price too for this bag.
customer_reviews.author: J. Paschal

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Sak purse I have bought This blue color is so pretty And the quality of the Sak purse is amazing .
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful purse.
customer_reviews.text: Great size, glove leather. Lots of compliments. Fast delivery. I might have to order in more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: The purse I've been looking for!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect purse for me...one I can carry every day. I looked for a long time before deciding upon this one. It is a great size. light weight and the color I chose is a nice deep brown, which is just what I had in mind. This was a good choice and, as usual, I appreciated the fast delivery received from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Woods

customer_reviews.title: ... for an over the shoulder bag and found the perfect one w/The SAK Iris Cross-Body
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking around for an over the shoulder bag and found the perfect one w/The SAK Iris Cross-Body. Absolutely love it. Very room, zippered side pocket on one side and an open pocket on other side, with strong zipper for main compartment. Love the security that a zipper offers over the magnetic buttons that other bags have. Also, love just having the shoulder strap, over the combo handbag/shoulder straps varieties that other bags sport. All in all, an excellent value for the money! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Dvorscak

customer_reviews.title: Top Bag!
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Just the right size to dissuade one from carrying too much!
customer_reviews.author: DaleC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect purse
customer_reviews.text: I need a cross body bag for travel this is a perfect one the leather is soft and purse is roomy not bulky once items placed in it
customer_reviews.author: J.J

customer_reviews.title: Nice leather and the strap is so pretty
customer_reviews.text: I adore this bag. Nice leather and the strap is so pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Penny TaRico

customer_reviews.title: I love this purse
customer_reviews.text: This purse is just right for cross body wearing. It is big enough to hold all my essentials but, not too big. My favorite SAK purse.
customer_reviews.author: BevAllen

customer_reviews.title: Inferior spotted leather
customer_reviews.text: I have another Sak almost like this in black which is quality leather throughout. I like is so well I thought I'd order a color for Spring and Summer. The color was a nice neutral blush but the quality of the leather was inferior. It had off-white spots all over in various places and in some places the leather was very thin and crinkly. I sent it back. Maybe I just got a bad one but these Sak bags are usually way more expensive so maybe these are seconds. Maybe you'll have better luck.
customer_reviews.author: LuLu, Calif

customer_reviews.title: Why the cloth strap? It cheapens the appearance.
customer_reviews.text: A nice-looking, practical bag that would definitely be nicer with an all-leather (rather than fabric) strap.
customer_reviews.author: Allen H. Kelson

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this purse ...
customer_reviews.text: The leather is buttery soft in spite of being amazingly metallic. All in all, this is one of my all time favorite purses.
customer_reviews.author: Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: The color is richer and more beautiful than I had imagined
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day! The color is richer and more beautiful than I had imagined. I love this purse!
customer_reviews.author: Olympia R Pakis

customer_reviews.title: It is exactly what I wanted for a long time and did not find in my home town.
customer_reviews.text: I live in Costa Rica. So I received it yesterday. It is exactly what I was expecting. The materials, the size, the color and the style I saw on Amazone. It is light and beautiful and it will make me feel content when walking on the streets and going out. I was given a good service. Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marlene

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful purse!
customer_reviews.text: I love this purse. The leather is soft & I llike the way it lays flat against my body.
customer_reviews.author: alex r

customer_reviews.title: how to make a good handbag bad
customer_reviews.text: I bought this handbag middle of Aug. Used it for 2 trips and the strap has already broken. I did not overload it as had read review that the strap was a problem. It is a cute purse with nice leather and so far no other problems. I am going to try to get it rivetted like another person suggested, but it should have made better. I gave it 3 stars for cuteness and all the other things but the strap made me want to give it no stars.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight Larson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent size!
customer_reviews.text: I used this on vacation in Spain and loved it! The stuff I needed to have with me all fit and left room to put those post cards I purchased at each stop in the side pocket. Great shape, size and looks. I'll use it again on my next trip.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne M. Weber

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: It is smaller than what I thought and too expensive for what you get, plus IT BROKE THE FIRST DAY I WORE IT! I was really exited about this bag but it really disappointed me!! DO NOT recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Adriana D

customer_reviews.title: Nice color and perfect quality!
customer_reviews.text: I like the navy blue color, leather quality and overall look of this bag. I have a brown The SAK bag bought here in the Philippines in 2008 and it still looks the same as the day when it was bought. I ordered another The SAK bag because I trust the brand. I might buy another one soon. I recommend this brand to quality conscious ladies!
customer_reviews.author: Pinay in Cebu

customer_reviews.title: Love it ! Love it ! Love it !
customer_reviews.text: So convenient to use, goes with everything, plenty of storage and have had innumerable comments on what a smart looking bag it is and "Where did you get that?"
customer_reviews.author: "Old rider" "Kitty"

customer_reviews.title: it literally stinks. I thought my son had a ...
customer_reviews.text: it literally stinks. I thought my son had a poopy diaper, but it came from the bag. I can't stand it. Also the size is a bit too deep for me. Also kind of rigid. Returning it.
customer_reviews.author: iloveamazon

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! I bought it for a trip to Europe. I wanted a crossbody bag that held enough for long walks through the towns I was visiting. This bag was beautiful and functional. It held everything I needed, including a small umbrella, and I felt totally safe. Plus, I received a ton of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: J. Owens

customer_reviews.title: perfect for young professional
customer_reviews.text: Gifted a neat young lady with this bag. She loved it. Hands free for errands and busy days. Researched and found this bag profile in a much more expensive brand. Neat and casual. Reliable and serviceable brand and always fashionable.
customer_reviews.author: Steve G. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: To bad about my bag
customer_reviews.text: Watch out for color transfer from demin. Ruined the back of the bag
customer_reviews.author: J. Charleston

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag!
customer_reviews.text: Great bag, nice leather. It did have a small grease spot on the fabric strap, but I was able to spot- clean it. I have two of these now. I love the size and the adjustable strap! Great for travel!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy E

customer_reviews.title: Purse received didn't match the picture
customer_reviews.text: The bag I received was the same color as this one, but the style wasn't anything like the pictures. It was not a cross body, had a leather strap, had a zipper front pocket and a slit back pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Orangeflowers

customer_reviews.title: A great purse...!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is both a stylish and comfortable cross body handbag...!!!! It's well-constructed and very good looking along with being roomy....!!!! I would highly recommend this purse for traveling or just shopping around town.
customer_reviews.author: QueenBee

customer_reviews.title: Very nice purse
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th SAK purse and I am again delighted. The leather is very soft and purse spacious
customer_reviews.author: Nancy T

customer_reviews.title: Nice brown color
customer_reviews.text: I like the bag, but did not notice that the strap was canvas versus leather. Looks too casual for dress wear but is okay for jeans, etc. Will keep it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Judy O

customer_reviews.title: sparkly strap is perfect for a cross body bag
customer_reviews.text: Soft leather, sparkly strap is perfect for a cross body bag. I love the Sak
customer_reviews.author: ssst

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful bag. The leather is lovely, and the multi-colored strips and fun. Excellent quality. The bag is a good size--not too big or too small. It fits comfortably as a cross-body bag and is not heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Gardener

customer_reviews.title: May work better for someone else
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice bag; however, I am having problems with it because I did not know that there would be so many tassels on it. I saw the ones on the front of the purse and I expected one to be there for the zipper. What I didn't expect was to have tassels getting caught in the zipper or that the purse would be so flimsy that closing the top zipper requires both hands. One to hold the purse still and the other to untangle the tassels that get caught in the zipper. Also, I am not even sure this purse is made of leather!
customer_reviews.author: MDHC

customer_reviews.title: The Sak
customer_reviews.text: A little too big for my taste but very nice to use when trying to carry long or more items than the basics; very nice leather; strap makes it more casual looking because its clothe; Doesn't take much to make this bag too heavy and hurt your shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: Mssuzy

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Great color
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Great color, great quality and very comfortable to wear over my shoulder. It's roomy enough for the basics and has a nice outside pocket for easy access to my cell phone. I HIGHLY recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Love, love this crossbody
customer_reviews.text: Love, love this crossbody!!!! Excellent material, strong, sturdy. Use it almost everyday. Will buy another in a different color for spring.
customer_reviews.author: diane dalessandro

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect. Lots of compartments, just the right size, and being a cross body, it is safe. Love the color and the interesting details.
customer_reviews.author: Moon Pigeon

customer_reviews.title: It held up well and she loved it. I bought this new one in this ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a friend's birthday. We purchased her one 2 years ago. It held up well and she loved it. I bought this new one in this bright color to add a little glam to her life. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Running P Ranch

customer_reviews.title: The product is already falling apart.... ...
customer_reviews.text: The product is already falling apart...... I bought it because i was having surgery and needed a side purse, never again! I've barely even used it!
customer_reviews.author: Angelique Dunaway

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful purse
customer_reviews.text: This purse is so soft and beautiful. I have the matching wallet too.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda DQ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can carry my Iphone, Ipad and all my essentials in the same bag. It is not too small or too large...just right! Hubby got it for my birthday and really surprised me.
customer_reviews.author: R. Keller

customer_reviews.title: Extremely attractive and of high quality.
customer_reviews.text: Really good looking purse. Light weight and roomy for the size. Has the right number of compartments and pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Emma A. Fine

customer_reviews.title: the perfect purse
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect purse. Had tons of compliments on it. Perfect size perfect amount of compartments. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Carole Fairris

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: Quality cross body bag with a chic design! I would definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and spacious
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this purse after searching for months. I love the color of it, and especially the multicolored chevron pattern on the inside! It's very spacious and has a few side pockets on the inside as well. My one complaint is that after owning it for two weeks the strap started to rip. I'm not sure if I put too many things in it or if it was a faulty purse. Either way I sent it back and immediately received a brand new one. I've now had this one for several months with no problems! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: kariluci

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. The leather is beautiful and very soft. Great shape and has compartments for all my needs. I really am in love with this purse
customer_reviews.author: Chis

customer_reviews.title: Love this SAK!
customer_reviews.text: This SAK is the perfect size for me, neither too large nor too small. The outside pockets work well to hold those quick now needs. And the leather is very soft and the color is pretty. Perfect all around for me.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah DeBruyn

customer_reviews.title: Great Pocketbook
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel of the leather; the colors, the size and how I can find everything. It is very comfortable as a crossbody bag and well worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customersandra

customer_reviews.title: I like it, but is a little heavier bag than ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it, but is a little heavier bag than I like. Holds everything I need, is practical in color and shape
customer_reviews.author: #1 Grandmother

customer_reviews.title: I love this hand bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this hand bag. A firend has one and I just wanted one ASAP. Amazon came through for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: it's made of a plastic like substance. It's too pricey for the product
customer_reviews.text: This purse is advertised as leather. It is not leather, it's made of a plastic like substance. It's too pricey for the product. I'll keep it anyway, but buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: J. W.

customer_reviews.title: Great purse
customer_reviews.text: This is a great purse for the summer. The color is the best. I love the size, it is not too small or not too big I also have this in navy color too I feel much safer with a cross body purse
customer_reviews.author: robin r young

customer_reviews.title: This bag is a perfect size. It has two pockets on the outside ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag is a perfect size. It has two pockets on the outside (one zippered) and its deep. Love everything about this bag!
customer_reviews.author: Jeannine

customer_reviews.title: love this purse
customer_reviews.text: I love this purse, just as pictured, feels nice, holds everything I like to have with me.
customer_reviews.author: sknb

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag with the hope it would work for what I needed. I was surprised it met my needs. The bag is very soft,durable and well made. I would recommend this to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It goes with everything and I can carry all I need comfortably
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: However the quality is very good. Maybe the order picker was
customer_reviews.text: We ordered tobacco, but it was delivered black! However the quality is very good. Maybe the order picker was colorblind
customer_reviews.author: James L Smallwood

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, however...
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute purse and a great medium size! However I wore it with a darker pair of jeans for a couple of days on vacation and the purse was ruined. Kind of a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: NickiZ

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: Zip pocket on front is just right for my smart phone. Even though I carry a wallet, the bag lays flat when I carry it as a cross body. I do love the easy adjust strap, can change to shoulder carry in a snap.
customer_reviews.author: E-beth

customer_reviews.title: wonderful crossbody
customer_reviews.text: i love this bag as it is roomy and holds all my items as well as pockets for my e-book and a my phone. I can easily find everything and this bag is not too heavy. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: France Webster

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Leather is soft and does not hold up. Color from clothes transfers to leather on bag.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: cute bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag, the bottom corners started losing color and turning white after a bit. Other than that, its cute and held up pretty nicely. Its a perfect size too.
customer_reviews.author: happymommy

customer_reviews.title: Most Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I COULD NOT BE MORE PLEASED. THE QUALITY IS EXCELLENT AND CERTAINLY IS MORE THAN I HAVE SEEN IN BAGS AT TWICE THE PRICE. IT IS EXACTLY AS SHOWN AND DESCRIBED.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Sue

product_meta.title: The Sak Iris Cross Body Bag
product_meta.description:
If you're seeking a grab-n-go bag with easy style, look no further. The SAK's Iris cross-body has subtle detailing that lets its pretty pebbled leather stay in the spotlight. Need to stay hands-free? Iris also has an extra-long strap.

The Sak is one of the largest handbag companies in the country, offering multiple, highly differentiated handbag brands, including The Sak and Elliott Lucca. The Sak brand karma is happy and free. Peace and harmony among all things is interwoven into their spirit and their deeply rooted brand heritage. Their bags complement your easy-going style, taking you effortlessly from work to the weekend.




PRODUCT DETAILS
